thread.title: P Lombardi
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by P Lombardi

author: P Lombardi
title: P Lombardi
text: I was at leery to buy a used book. I was looking for a cook book for making bread dated the 1970"s. Didn't think I'd even find it, which I didn't at first but Thrift Books notified me a few days later that it came in. I was happy & I ordered it right there & then. It came in very good condition for it's age. After showing me how important I was to Thrift Books for a used book I thought this is a reliable company. I then went back for every book to check if they would have it. They have whatever I am looking for, which is sent out fast & in good condition. I will always buy my used books from Thrift Books, they are the best.
